title: The heads and substance of a discourse; first private, and afterwards publike; held in Axbridge, in the county of Somerset, about the 6th of March, 1650. Between Iohn Smith of Badgworth, and Charls Carlile of Bitsham, &c. on the one part; and Thomas Collier of Westbury on the other. Things they are of weight and highest concernment. / Published by the said Tho. Collier of Westbury.
author: Collier, Thomas, fl. 1691.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed for Giles Calvert, at the Black Spred-Eagle at the west end of Pauls,
